item.name: Emacs - Use Control+X as prefix key
item.item:
Control+X detail C-x C-s to Save (Command+S) C-x C-f to Open (Command+O) C-x u to Undo (Command+Z) C-x k to Close (Command+W) C-x C-c to Quit (Command+Q) C-x C-g to turn off Control+X Mode notsave.emacsmode_ex_controlX_core_0 {{ EMACS_MODE_C_X_EXTRA }} __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::S, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::S, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::VK_CONFIG_FORCE_OFF_notsave_emacsmode_ex_controlX_core_0 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::C, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::Q, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::VK_CONFIG_FORCE_OFF_notsave_emacsmode_ex_controlX_core_0 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::H, ModifierFlag::NONE | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::A, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::VK_CONFIG_FORCE_OFF_notsave_emacsmode_ex_controlX_core_0 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::O, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::VK_CONFIG_FORCE_OFF_notsave_emacsmode_ex_controlX_core_0 __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::U, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::Z, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::VK_CONFIG_FORCE_OFF_notsave_emacsmode_ex_controlX_core_0, __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::K, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::W, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::VK_CONFIG_FORCE_OFF_notsave_emacsmode_ex_controlX_core_0, __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::G, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::VK_CONFIG_FORCE_OFF_notsave_emacsmode_ex_controlX_core_0
BAKOMA

item.name: Emacs - Use Control+Space as MarkSet
item.item:
MarkSet Mode detail Control+W to Command_L+X Option+W to Command_L+C Control+G to turn off MarkSet Control+Space to turn off MarkSet notsave.emacsmode_ex_controlSpace_core_0 {{ EMACS_MODE_MARKSET_EXTRA }}
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::W, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::VK_LOCK_SHIFT_L_FORCE_OFF, KeyCode::X, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::VK_CONFIG_FORCE_OFF_notsave_emacsmode_ex_controlSpace_core_0, Option::NOREPEAT,
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::W, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_OPTION | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::VK_LOCK_SHIFT_L_FORCE_OFF, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::VK_CONFIG_FORCE_OFF_notsave_emacsmode_ex_controlSpace_core_0, Option::NOREPEAT,
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::G, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_CONTROL | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::VK_LOCK_SHIFT_L_FORCE_OFF, KeyCode::VK_CONFIG_FORCE_OFF_notsave_emacsmode_ex_controlSpace_core_0, Option::NOREPEAT,
